text: 1 Protect Britain’s Place in Europe
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 1.1 Giving the people the final say
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats are open and outward-looking.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We passionately believe that Britain’s relationship with its neighbours is stronger as part of the European Union.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Whatever its imperfections, the EU remains the best framework for working effectively and co-operating in the pursuit of our shared aims.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: It has led directly to greater prosperity,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: increased trade,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: investment and jobs,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: better security
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and a greener environment.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Britain is better off in the EU.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats campaigned for the UK to remain in the EU.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: However, we acknowledge the result of the 2016 referendum, which gave the government a mandate to start negotiations to leave.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The decision Britain took, though, was simply whether to remain in or to leave the European Union.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: There was no option on the ballot paper to choose the shape of our future relationship with the EU on vital issues including trade, travel or security.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: While much remains uncertain about Theresa May’s approach, it is now clear that the Conservatives are campaigning for a hard Brexit.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This means leaving the single market, ending freedom of movement and abandoning the customs union – even though these choices will make the UK poorer and disappoint many leave voters who wanted a different outcome.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The effects of Brexit are already being felt.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The value of the pound has plummeted.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Inflation has risen.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Growth in the economy has slowed
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and the government is already borrowing billions more to fill the gap in lost tax revenue.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Young people, who voted overwhelmingly to remain, are being told their voices do not matter.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Urgent problems, such as the future of the NHS, are being neglected because of the sheer scale of the challenge posed by Brexit.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: A hard Brexit will make all these problems worse.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: It is the wrong choice for the country.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats will fight to prevent a hard Brexit.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: At the end of negotiations there will be a decision on the deal.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The Conservatives want the decision to be taken by politicians.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats believe the British people should have the final say.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: That’s why, when the terms of our future relationship with the EU have been negotiated (over the next two years on the Government’s timetable), we will put that deal to a vote of the British people in a referendum,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: with the alternative option of staying in the EU on the ballot paper.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We continue to believe that there is no deal as good for the UK outside the EU as the one it already has^as a member.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Every vote for the Liberal Democrats in this election is a vote to give the final say to the British people.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 1.2 Fighting a hard Brexit
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: During negotiations, we commit ourselves to use our strength in parliament to press for keeping Britain as close as possible to Europe.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our priorities will include: Protection of rights for EU citizens and UK citizens:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will press for the UK to unilaterally guarantee the rights of EU nationals in the UK, ending their ongoing uncertainty.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will call for the overhaul and simplification of the registration process and the requirements for EU nationals to obtain permanent residence and UK citizenship, as the current system is not fit for purpose.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will urge the government, and use our influence with Liberal leaders in European countries, to secure the same rights for UK citizens living in European Union countries.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Membership of the single market and customs union: We believe that any deal negotiated for the UK outside the EU must ensure that trade can continue without customs controls at the border,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and must maintain membership of the single market, which smooths trade between the UK and the continent by providing a common ‘rule book’ for businesses and a common mechanism to ensure that everyone abides by the rules.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Freedom of movement: We support the principle of freedom of movement – to abandon it would threaten Britain’s prosperity
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and reputation as an open, tolerant society.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Any deal negotiated for the U K outside the EU must protect the right to work, travel, study and retire across the EU.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Any restrictions sought by the government must take account of the vital importance of EU workers to the British economy, including public services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Opportunities for young people:In an increasingly globalised and complex world, it is vital that our young people are afforded the same opportunities their parents enjoyed to work, study and travel abroad.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: To that end we will do everything we can to protect Erasmus+ and other EU-funded schemes which increase opportunities for young people.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Defending social rights and equalities:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Many important protections such as the right to 52 weeks’ maternity leave and rights to annual leave are currently based on EU law,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and many of these rights have been upheld at the European Court of Justice.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats will fight to ensure that these entitlements are not undermined.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Maintaining environmental standards:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The European Union has created the highest environmental standards in the world.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We have a duty to future generations to protect our environment and tackle climate change.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats will ensure that everything is done to maintain those high standards in UK law, including the closest possible co-operation on climate and energy policy.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Law enforcement and judicial co-operation:  Europol, the European Arrest Warrant and shared access to police databases have helped make Britain’s streets safer.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will fight to maintain maximum co-operation to ensure criminals are pursued quickly and effectively, and police are not frustrated by huge amounts of red tape.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: British business and jobs: We must protect support for domestic industries such as farming, tourism and the creative industries,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: as well as regional support for deprived areas.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The City of London is Europe’s financial capital
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and must retain its full rights in EU financial markets.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Science and research funding: Research is vital for our long-term prosperity, security and wellbeing –
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: but the Leave vote has already started to affect existing and proposed research programmes.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will campaign against any reduction in investment in UK universities
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and for their right to apply for EU funds on equal terms.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Travel and tourism: Britain is an outward-looking country with commercial and leisure interests around the world, particularly in Europe.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will strive to retain traveller and tourist benefits such as the European Health Insurance Card, reduced roaming charges and pet passports, all of which are at risk by leaving the European Union.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Respect for the interests of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland: We will fight to ensure that the priorities and long-term interests of the nations of the UK are fully taken into account during negotiations.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will oppose any moves that threaten the political stability of Northern Ireland.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will also campaign to protect the rights of the people of Gibraltar.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2 Save our NHS and Social Care Services
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Good health is a prerequisite to taking full advantage of life’s opportunities, and we must do all we can to help people stay healthy as well as provide high-quality care when they are ill.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Mental health is just as important as physical health and we have made it a priority to deliver equality between the two.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The N HS has been the envy of the world, but it is now facing the greatest crisis in its history and we urgently need to increase its funding.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: As a country, we are living longer – but that means more people are living with conditions like diabetes and dementia and they need help to live with dignity and the maximum degree of independence.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We must set the highest standards in care, abolishing the artificial boundaries that prevent health and social care services working together.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Health and wellbeing are affected by far more than just the quality of health and social care services, so we will work to improve the wider factors that affect people’s health such as warm homes, clean air and access to exercise and healthy food so that everyone can have the best chance to lead a healthy life.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our priorities in the next parliament will be: Saving the NHS by putting a penny in the pound on Income Tax to give the NHS and social care services the cash injection they need.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Transforming mental health care with waiting time standards to match those in physical health care.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Home not hospital: better integration of health and social care
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and limiting the amount elderly people have to pay for social care.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.1 Saving the NHS and social care
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The N HS and social care services are in a state of crisis.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The Conservatives have left them chronically underfunded, while need continues to grow and patient care suffers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Social care is facing a funding black hole of £2 billion this year alone
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and more than a million older people are missing out on the care they need.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: People are routinely left stranded in hospital after they finish their treatment because the follow-up care and support they need is not available.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Nearly two-thirds of N HS trusts ended the last financial year in deficit.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Yet Labour and Conservative politicians refuse to be honest with the public about the scale of the crisis or the tough decisions which are needed to protect these vital services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats recognise that Britain’s health and social care services are our most treasured national institutions.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Any party seeking to lead the country after this election should be prepared to take bold action to safeguard them.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This isn’t about doing the easiest thing, it is about doing what is right and what is essential.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats will take five key steps to put our health and social care system back on a sustainable financial footing:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 1 . An immediate 1 p rise on the basic, higher and additional rates of Income Tax to raise £6 billion additional revenue, which would be ringfenced to be spent only on N HS and social care services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Direct this additional investment to the following priority areas in the health and care system: social care, primary care (and other out-of-hospital care), mental health and public health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This represents the most efficient and effective way of spending these extra resources – ensuring they will have the greatest impact on the quality of care patients receive.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: In the longer term and as a replacement for the 1 p Income Tax rise, commission the development of a dedicated health and care tax on the basis of wide consultation, possibly based on a reform of National Insurance contributions, which will bring together spending on both services into a collective budget and set out transparently, on people’s payslips, what we spend on them.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Establish a cross-party health and social care convention, bringing together stakeholders from all political parties, patients groups, the public and professionals from within the health and social care system to carry out a comprehensive review of the longer-term sustainability of the health and social care finances and workforce, and the practicalities of greater integration.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We would invite the devolved administrations to be a part of this work.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce a statutory independent budget monitoring agency for health and care, similar to the Office for Budget Responsibility.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This would report every three years on how much money the system needs to deliver safe and sustainable treatment and care, and how much is needed to meet the costs of projected increases in demand and any new initiatives – to ensure any changes in services are properly costed and affordable.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our longer-term objective will be to bring together NHS and social care into one seamless service – pooling budgets in every area by 2020 and developing integrated care organisations.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.2 Valuing the NHS and social care workforce
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our health and social care services’ greatest resource is their staff, working tirelessly under immense pressure.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This Government has left them feeling embattled and undervalued.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: To support the N HS and social care workforce we will: Guarantee the rights of all N HS and social care service staff who are EU nationals to stay in the UK.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End the public sector pay freeze for NHS workers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Reinstate student nurse bursaries.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Support innovation in how organisations can empower staff and patients, including learning from innovative social enterprises delivering community and mental health services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Protect N HS whistle-blowers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: GPs in particular have been put under considerable strain due to severe underfunding and neglect from the Conservatives, leaving many people waiting weeks to get appointments.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: GPs are the core of what the NHS is and they need su pport to ensure that the N HS is able to su rvive and thrive.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Produce a national workforce strategy, ensuring that we never again experience a shortage in the numbers of GPs, hospital doctors, nurses and other professionals that the N HS needs.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.3 Equal care for mental health
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: In government, we fought tirelessly to reduce the historic inequality between the way physical and mental health are treated in the NHS and are proud of the strides forward we made.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We legislated to give mental and physical health equality under the law.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We introduced the first waiting time standards for access to treatment for mental health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We introduced the crisis care concordat which dramatically reduced the number of people who end up in police cells when they experience a mental health crisis;
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and we secured more money for children and young people’s mental health services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: But we know that not enough resources reach front-line services and that in the fight for parity of esteem there is still a very long way to go.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will:
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ringfence funding from within the one penny Income Tax rise, to provide additional investment in mental health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Continue to roll out access and waiting time standards for children, young people and adults.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This will include a guarantee that people will not wait more than six weeks for therapy for depression or anxiety
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and no young person will wait more than two weeks for treatment when they experience a first episode of psychosis.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Increase access to clinically- and cost-effective talking therapies so that hundreds of thousands more people can receive this support.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Examine the case for introducing a dedicated service for children and Young people based on the Australian ‘headspace’ model and building on many excellent youth information, advice and counselling services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Transform mental health support for pregnant women, new mothers and those who have experienced miscarriage or stillbirth, and help them get early care when needed.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Continue to promote and invest in the Frontline programme to fast-track exceptional graduates into children’s social work, as well as the Think Ahead scheme aimed at encouraging high-achieving graduates to pursue a career in mental health social work.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure that no one in crisis is turned away, with new waiting time standards and better crisis care in accident and emergency departments, in the community and via phone lines.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This will enable us to end the use of police cells for people facing a mental health crisis.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End out-of-area placements, ensuring those admitted to hospital for mental ill-health are able to be treated close to home.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure that all front-line public service professionals, including in schools and universities, receive better training in mental health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Roll out the Liaison and Diversion programme nationally, helping to identify people who have mental health problems, learning disabilities, substance misuse or other vulnerabilities when they first come into contact with the criminal justice system.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Tackle stigma against mental ill-health, including by building on the good work done by organisations such as Heads Together
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and changing the standard of proof in suicide conclusions in the Coroner’s Court.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure that LGBT+ inclusive mental health services receive funding and support.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Medical research is vital for developing new and better treatments.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will fight the threat Brexit poses to medical research funding.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We support the principle that all medical trials using public facilities or resources should comply with the Open Trials standards
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and that a fair proportion of all public funding for medical research should be focused on research into mental ill-health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We also favour the further development of open access academic journals.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.4 Home not hospital: joining up health and social care
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We need services that fit around people’s lives, not ones that force them to fit their lives around the care they need.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: This will become increasingly important as our population ages and the number of people living with long-term conditions grows.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: It is also more cost-effective to support people to be able to live at home rather than endure lengthy stays in hospital.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We must move away from a fragmented system to an integrated service with more joined-up care and more personal budgets so that people can design services for their own individual needs.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We believe this should happen from the bottom up, suiting the needs of local communities.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The number of family carers is rising, including in the ‘sandwich generation’ who find themselves trying to care for their children and their parents at the same time.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Carers are unsung heroes; we need to do more to help them.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will: Finish the job of implementing a cap on the cost of social care, which the Conservatives have effectively abandoned.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Move towards single place-based budgets for health and social care by 2020, allowing local areas to decide how best to provide the full spectrum of care for their community.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Remodel the health care funding system to eliminate perverse incentives, by moving away from payments for activity and introducing tariffs that encourage joined-up services and promote improved outcomes for patients and better preventive care.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure those who work in the social care sector are properly trained, with accessible career pathways,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and are suitable to practice by introducing a statutory code of conduct backed up by a care workers’ suitability register.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Raise the amount people can earn before losing Carer’s Allowance from £1 10 to £1 50 a week,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and reduce the number of hours’ care per week required to qualify.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Give the NHS a legal duty to identify carers and develop a Carer’s Passport scheme to inform carers of their NHS rights, such as flexible visiting hours and access to support.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Provide more choice at the end of life and move towards free end-of-life social care, whether people spend their last days at home or in a hospice.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Evaluate the valuable work of hospices with a view to putting them on a more sustainable financial footing and allowing them to expand their services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.5 Better access to community services
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Most people’s experience of the NHS is their local GP or the nurses and support staff who visit them at home or work in community clinics.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Access to care in GP surgeries and closer to home is better for patients and will also help reduce pressure on hospitals, accident and emergency departments and ambulances.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will: Promote easier access to GPs, expanding evening and weekend opening to meet the needs of local patients, encouraging online, phone and Skype appointments, encouraging GPs to work together in federations and allowing people more choice.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Provide national support to struggling GP practices, preventing mass practice closures.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Support GPs to come together to collectively provide services such as out-of-norma l-open i ng-hours appointments.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Use innovation funding to promote GP-led multidisciplinary health and care hubs, including mobile services to keep people out of hospital.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Encourage GPs and other community clinicians to work in disadvantaged areas through our Patient Premium – which would give incentive payments to clinicians.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure that any changes to the way pharmacies are funded do not leave local areas without reasonable access to a community pharmacist.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Review the rules for exemption from prescription charges to ensure they are fair to those with long-term conditions and disabilities.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 2.6 Helping people stay healthy
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: It is better for patients and for the NHS if we keep people healthy in the first place, rather than just waiting until people develop illnesses and come for treatment, but 40% of NHS spending is on diseases that are preventable.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We need to do more to promote healthy eating and exercise, making people aware of the dangers of smoking and excessive consumption of alcohol and other drugs, and helping to improve mental health and wellbeing.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will: Move towards a health and social care system that empowers and encourages people to better manage their own health and conditions and to live healthier lives.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Publish a National Wellbeing Strategy, which puts better health and wellbeing for all at the heart of government policy.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Implement the recommendations of the O’Neill report on antimicrobial resistance to ensure responsible prescribing
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and investment in diagnostics and innovation.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Make Pre-Exposure Prophylaxis (PrEP) for HIV prevention available on the NHS.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Support effective public awareness campaigns such as Be Clear on Cancer and learn from what works when designing new health promotion campaigns to change behaviour.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Keep public health within local government, where it is effectively joined up with preventive community services,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and reinstate the funding cut from public health budgets by the Conservatives.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Develop a strategy to tackle childhood obesity, including restricting the marketing of junk food to children, restricting TV advertising before the 9pm watershed and closing loopholes in the sugary drinks tax.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Encourage the traffic-light labelling system for food products and publication of information on calorie, fat, sugar and salt content in restaurants and takeaways.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce mandatory targets on sugar reduction for food and drink producers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Reduce smoking rates, introducing a levy on tobacco companies so they fairly contribute to the costs of health care and smoking cessation services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Implement the recommendations of the Keogh review to regulate cosmetic surgery
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and ensure that the NHS is not picking up the tab for private malpractice.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce minimum unit pricing for alcohol, subject to the final outcome of the legal challenge in Scotland.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Develop a public health campaign promoting the steps people can take to improve their own mental resilience – the wellbeing equivalent of the ‘Five a Day’ ca m pa ign .
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Support good practice among employers in promoting wellbeing
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and ensure people with mental health problems get the help they need to stay in or find work,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: with a ‘wellbeing premium’ to reward employers who take clear action to measurably improve the health of their employees.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will develop a just settlement for haemophiliacs who were given contaminated blood, and for their families.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 3 Put Children First
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats have always put education at the heart of our agenda.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Education opens the mind,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: it fosters understanding and tolerance,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and it empowers our children

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our priorities in the next parliament will be: Making the positive case for immigration
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and reducing hate crimes by targeting the people who commit them and making all hate crimes aggravated offences, allowing for harsher sentencing of perpetrators.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.1 Rights and equalities
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Whether by righting past wrongs, protecting citizens or increasing freedom, the Liberal Democrats believe that legislation defending rights and liberties protects individuals
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and drives opportunity for many underrepresented groups.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats oppose all discrimination and believe that government should take an active role both in punishing discrimination and in ensuring it does not happen in the first place.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our society is only strong once it includes everybody – regardless of their background.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: To extend diversity in public life and business, we will: Fund more extensive childcare, and provide better back-to-work support to reach an ambitious goal of one million more women in work by 2025.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Continue the drive for diversity in business leadership, pushing for at least 40% of board members being women in FTSE 350 companies
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and implementing the recommendations of the Parker review to increase ethnic minority representation.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Extend the Equality Act to all large companies with more than 250 employees, requiring them to monitor and publish data on gender, BAME, and LGBT+ employment levels and pay gaps.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Extend the use of name-blind recruitment processes in the public sector and encourage their use in the private sector.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Require diversity in public appointments.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will introduce a presumption that every shortlist should include at least one BAME candidate.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Extend requirements on companies to strengthen responsibility for supply chains.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Focus on good practice in tackling modern slavery, including training for police and prosecutors in identifying and supporting victims, and implement the Ewins report recommendations on domestic workers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: To safeguard rights
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and promote equalities,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: we will:  Campaign to reduce intolerance, including anti-Semitism, and hate crimes alongside organisations such as Show Racism the Red Card, the Anne Frank Trust UK, and Kick It Out.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Guarantee the freedom of people to wear religious or cultural dress,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and tackle the growing incidence of Islamophobic hate crime.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce an ‘X’ option on passports, identity documents, and official forms for those who do not wish to identify as either male or female, and campaign for their introduction in the provision of other services, for example utilities.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Decriminalise the sale and purchase of sex, and the management of sex work – reducing harm,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: defending sex workers’ human rights,

text: and focusing police time and resources on those groomed, forced or trafficked into the sex industry.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We would provide additional support for those wishing to leave sex work.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and streamline and simplify the Gender Recognition Act 2004 to allow individuals to change their legal gender without unnecessary bureaucratic hurdles, for example the intrusive medical tests currently required.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Remove the spousal veto,

text: and abolish remaining marriage inequalities in areas such as pensions, hospital visitation rights and custody of children in the event of bereavement.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Develop a government-wide plan to tackle BAME inequalities,

text: and review the Equality and Human Rights Commission to determine whether it is effectively fulfilling its role and whether its funding is adequate.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Address period poverty by providing free sanitary products to girls at school.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Outlaw caste discrimination.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.2 Liberty
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats believe that we should all be free from an overreaching state
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and that the individual freedoms guaranteed by the European Convention on Human Rights (ECHR) and the Human Rights Act are central to a free and democratic society.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: For that reason, the Liberal Democrats will: Oppose any attempt to withdraw from the ECHR or abolish or water down the Human Rights Act.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce a digital bill of rights that protects people’s powers over their own information,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: supports individuals over large corporations,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and preserves the neutrality of the internet.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and commence part two of the Leveson inquiry as soon as practicable.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End the ministerial veto on release of information under the Freedom of Information Act,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and take steps to reduce the proportion of FOI requests where information is withheld by government departments.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.3 Crime and policing
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: After years of reduction in traditional crime we have seen an increase, particularly in violent crime, since 2015.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: At the same time police forces are under pressure from reduced funding, with less money available for the community policing we all value.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: For these reasons Liberal Democrats will: Increase community policing in England and Wales by giving an additional £300 million a year to local police forces to reverse the increase in violent crime,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: boost community confidence
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and increase the flow of community intelligence.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Maintain, as part of our fight against hard Brexit, cross-border co-operation in combatting serious organised crime, including international fraud and child sexual exploitation, by retaining the European Arrest Warrant, membership of Europol and access to EU information databases.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End the 1 % cap on police pay rises.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Require all front-line officers to wear body cameras on duty, protecting the public from abuse of power and police officers from malicious accusations.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Resource BAME staff associations such as the National Black Police Association to increase ethnic diversity and BAME participation in the police.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Provide government funding for a national rape crisis helpline with increased opening hours and advertisement.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End the anomaly that forces Police Scotland and the Scottish Fire and Rescue Service to pay VAT on their purchases.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Replace Police and Crime Commissioners, elected at great expense in elections with very low turnout, with accountable police boards made up of local councillors.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Build on the success of crime maps to use data more effectively to reduce crime and improve policing, including exploring the feasibility of mandatory reporting of fraud losses by individual credit and debit-card providers.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.4 Criminal justice
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The criminal courts need modernising.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: There are too many people in prison.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our reoffending rates are terrible
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and our prisons, many old and squalid, are in crisis – overcrowded and woefully understaffed, with drug abuse, violence, suicide and self-harm endemic.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: That’s why Liberal Democrats will: Introduce a Victims’ Bill of Rights that will create a single point of contact for victims in the criminal justice system,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: increase victims’ access to information about their cases,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and give victims the right to request restorative justice rather than a prison sentence.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Introduce a presumption against short prison sentences and increase the use of tough, non-custodial punishments including weekend and evening custody, curfews, community service and GPS tagging.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Promote community justice panels and restorative justice that brings victims and wrongdoers together to resolve conflict, reduce harm and encourage rehabilitation.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Extend the responsibility of the Youth Justice Board to all offenders under 21, giving it the power to commission mental-health services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Establish a Women’s Justice Board with a remit to meet the special needs of women offenders.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Transform prisons into places of rehabilitation, recovery, learning and work, with suitable treatment, education or work available to all prisoners;
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: adopt a holistic approach to prisoners with multiple problems,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and ensure that courses started in custody can be completed on release.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Review the investigation, prosecution, procedures and rules of evidence in cases of sexual and domestic violence.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure that trans prisoners are placed in prisons that reflect their gender identity, rather than their birth gender.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Reduce the overrepresentation of individuals from a BAME background at every stage of the criminal justice system, taking into account the upcoming recommendations of the Lammy review.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Secure further funding for criminal legal aid from sources other than the taxpayer, including insurance for company directors, and changes to restraint orders.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.5 Civil and family justice
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The justice system is under pressure.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Brexit threatens international co-operation,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: the Conservatives have failed to defend the rule of law which is the cornerstone of our democracy,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and cuts to legal aid have denied effective access to justice to many.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: For these reasons Liberal Democrats will: Ensure that the UK retains international arrangements for jurisdiction, the recognition and enforcement of judgments and for family cases currently enjoyed under the EU Brussels I and Brussels II regulation and the Hague child abduction convention.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Conduct an urgent and comprehensive review of the effects of the Legal Aid, Sentencing and Punishment of Offenders Act on access to justice, particularly funding for social welfare appeals, and domestic violence and exceptional cases.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Reverse the massive increases in court and tribunal fees, which prevent many from pursuing good cases.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Continue to modernise and simplify court procedures.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Protect our system of judicial review from further attack, retaining government accountability for unlawful action,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and offer a staunch defence of our judiciary and the rule of law.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.6 Terrorism and violent extremism
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: As recent events across Europe – and at the heart of our own democracy – have shown, terrorism and violent extremism threaten us all.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: As liberals, we must have an effective security policy
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: which is also accountable, community and evidencebased,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and does not unduly restrict personal liberty.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: That’s why the Liberal Democrats will: Continue cross-border co-operation between security forces across Europe.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Permit intercepts where justified
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and permit surveillance of those suspected of serious crime and terrorism with proper judicial oversight.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Scrap the flawed Prevent strategy and replace it with a scheme that prioritises community engagement and supports communities in developing their own approach to tackling the dangers of violent extremism.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Roll back state surveillance powers by ending the indiscriminate bulk collection of communications data, bulk hacking, and the collection of internet connection records.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Oppose Conservative attempts to undermine encryption.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Notify innocent people who have been placed under targeted surveillance where this can be done without jeopardising ongoing investigations.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.7 Combatting the harm done by drugs
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The war on drugs has been a catastrophic failure.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Every year, billions flow to organised crime while we needlessly prosecute and imprison thousands of people, blighting their employment and life chances, and doing nothing to address the impact of drugs on their health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Our current approach to drugs helps nobody except criminal gangs.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: For that reason Liberal Democrats will: End imprisonment for possession of illegal drugs for personal use, diverting those arrested for possession of drugs for personal use into treatment and education (adopting a health-based approach), or imposing civil penalties.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Break the grip of the criminal gangs and protect young people by introducing a legal, regulated market for cannabis.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We would introduce limits on potency and permit cannabis to be sold through licensed outlets to adults over the age of 18.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Concentrate on catching and prosecuting those who manufacture, import or deal in illegal drugs.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Repeal the Psychoactive Substances Act which has driven the sale of formerly legal highs underground.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Move the departmental lead on drugs policy to the Department of Health.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: 7.8 Immigration and asylum
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Immigration and asylum are under attack.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Immigration is essential to our economy and a benefit to our society.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We depend on immigration to ensure we have the people we need contributing to the UK’s economy and society, including doctors, agricultural workers, entrepreneurs, scientists and so many others.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Immigration broadens our horizons and encourages us to be more open, more tolerant.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Refugees are human beings fleeing from war zones and persecution, and we have a legal and moral obligation to offer them sanctuary.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The Liberal Democrats are proud of the UK’s historic commitments to assisting those seeking refuge from war, persecution and degradation, and believe that we should continue to uphold our responsibilities.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: The immigration and asylum systems have suffered from inefficiency and severe backlogs and delays over many years, harming their credibility and ability to operate effectively.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We recognise that large-scale immigration has placed strains on some local communities and services.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Major improvements are urgently needed.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: For that reason, when it comes to immigration the Liberal Democrats will: Ensure that the immigration system is operated fairly and efficiently, with strict control of borders, including entry and exit checks,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and adequately funded Border Force policing of entry by irregular routes.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Hold an annual debate in parliament on skill and labour market shortfalls and surpluses to identify the migration necessary to meet the UK’s needs.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Continue to allow high-skilled immigration to support key sectors of our economy,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and ensure work, tourist and family visas are processed quickly and efficiently.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Recognising their largely temporary status, remove students from the official migration statistics.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Ensure the UK is an attractive destination for overseas students.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: We will reinstate post-study work visas for graduates in STEM (science, technology, engineering and maths) subjects who find suitable employment within six months of graduating.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Give the devolved administrations the right to sponsor additional post-study work visas.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Work with u niversities to ensure a fair and transparent student visa process
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and find ways to measure accurately the number of students leaving at the end of their course.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Establish a centrally funded Migration Impact Fund to help local communities to adjust to new migration and meet unexpected pressures on public services and housing.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Provide additional government funding for English as an additional language classes to help migrants and residents gain independence and integrate with their local communities.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: And for asylum, the Liberal Democrats will: Apply the asylum system fairly, efficiently and humanely, including the process for those who have no right to be here.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Offer safe and legal routes to the UK for refugees to prevent them from making dangerous journeys, which too often result in the loss of life, for example via reform of family reunion rules to make it easier for refugees to join relatives already living in safety in the UK.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Expand the Syrian Vulnerable Persons Resettlement Scheme to offer sanctuary to 50,000 people over the lifetime of the next parliament.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Re-open the Dubs unaccompanied child refugee scheme, ensuring Britain meets its responsibilities by taking in 3,000 unaccompanied refugee children.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Liberal Democrats would offer these children indefinite leave to remain, meaning they will not be deported once they turn 18.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: End indefinite immigration detention by introducing a 28-day limit.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Speed up the processing of asylum claims, reducing the time genuine refugees must wait before they can settle into life in the UK.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Expect working-age asylum seekers who have waited more than six months for their claim to be processed to seek work like other benefit claimants, and only to receive benefits if they are unable to do so.
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: Offer asylum to people fleeing countries where their sexual orientation or gender identification means that they risk imprisonment, torture or execution,
title: Change Britain´s future. Liberal Democrat manifesto 2017

text: and stop deporting people at risk to such countries.

text: 9.6 England
